mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_no AS commentNo, c.post_no AS postNo, c.user_no AS userNo, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, c.comment_content AS commentContent, c.comment_date AS commentDate, c.parent_comment_no AS parentCommentNo, c.comment_like_cnt AS commentLikeCnt FROM tbl_comment c JOIN tbl_user u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.post_no = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment ( comment_no, post_no, user_no, comment_content, comment_date, parent_comment_no, comment_like_cnt ) VALUES ( seq_comment_no.NEXTVAL, #{postNo}, #{userNo}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE, #{parentCommentNo}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent} where comment_no = #{commentNo}
